interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 12ML Refillable Perfume Atomizer Bottle for Travel Spray Scent Pump Case Pack of 5
Review Date: 2020/03/13
Store: Rioa
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.71 x 0.71 x 4.13 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Surface Matalic Bottle', 'UPC': '753940391508'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:a3d7f3db939833c254ff74281c0dde18]] with the corona virus thing, i ordered this to fill with alcohol instead. i carry one in all my coat pockets and pocketbooks, so that i can spray my hands. the size is just right. you can't use up a whole thing of alcohol if went out in public. impressed with how pretty they are too. they are easy to figure out. the colors are just jackets -- you pull off the cap and the bottom so that you can unscrew the sprayer and fill it up. very good sprayer as well. not mad. i am happy.
Review Title: this came in handy
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
BYS Kabuki Brush BYS {'Brand': 'BYS', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '0.04 x 0.02 x 0.02 inches', 'Item Weight': '36 Grams', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.04 x 0.02 x 0.02 inches; 1.27 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BC/BYNKBS', 'Manufacturer': 'BYS'} It's smaller than expected. I thought it would be bigger because of the price. Is is a very soft brush and good for blending powder and buffing because it's not scratchy, I hate scratchy brushes. It's good to travel with. It also sheds a little bit at first washing. Is is a very soft brush and good for blending powder and buffing because it's not scratchy Mountain Falls Regular Dip-It Nail Polish Remover for Natural Nails, with Vitamin E and Panthenol, 9 Fluid Ounce Mountain Falls {'Brand': 'Mountain Falls', 'Item Weight': '0.5 Pounds', 'Unit Count': '9 Fl Oz'} i love the convenience and ease of use. just dip your finger in the hole and it erases the polish like it never happened. it is potent stuff. it's basically just remover with a foam soaked inside with a bunch of incisions that you can insert your nails in. no complaints except that you will taste the fume (bitter) when you first open it. just keep it away from nose. easy to use and effective JPNK 4PCS Anti-Static Detangling Fine & Wide Tooth Shower Comb Set JPNK {'Material': 'Plastic', 'Brand': 'JPNK', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy,Straight', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '12 x 3.1 x 0.7 inches; 5.61 Ounces'} love love love!

i love how they look. you get a wide tooth and fine tooth, and most of all they are aesthetically pleasing. no tugging, they are not sharp, they don't hurt the scalp. i do recommend. pretty, great value! a lot of combs! 12ML Refillable Perfume Atomizer Bottle for Travel Spray Scent Pump Case Pack of 5 Rioa {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.71 x 0.71 x 4.13 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Surface Matalic Bottle', 'UPC': '753940391508'} [[VIDEOID:a3d7f3db939833c254ff74281c0dde18]] with the corona virus thing, i ordered this to fill with alcohol instead. i carry one in all my coat pockets and pocketbooks, so that i can spray my hands. the size is just right. you can't use up a whole thing of alcohol if went out in public. impressed with how pretty they are too. they are easy to figure out. the colors are just jackets -- you pull off the cap and the bottom so that you can unscrew the sprayer and fill it up. very good sprayer as well. not mad. i am happy. this came in handy
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** This user continues to favor soft, quality beauty brushes and tools, with a strong preference for aesthetically pleasing products that combine functionality with visual appeal. Their enjoyment of practical tools, like a recent comb set, highlights this trend. They value comfort and ease of use, especially in products like nail polish remover.

- **Travel-Friendly:** The user prioritizes compact and transportable beauty tools, consistently seeking practicality in their beauty regimen. 

- **Expectation vs. Reality:** They maintain high standards for product size, functionality, and price, often feeling disappointed when these expectations are not met. However, their recent experience demonstrates a willingness to give high ratings when a product meets their criteria for effectiveness, beauty, and usability.

- **Quality Concerns:** The user values durability and performance over time, showing sensitivity to issues like over-shedding and harsh fumes. They prefer gentle tools that do not irritate.

- **Overall Satisfaction:** Their balanced approach to product evaluation is reflected in their recent review of a travel spray product, where they praised its size, ease of use, and attractiveness, awarding it a high rating despite initially using it for a non-traditional purpose. This reinforces their appreciation for products that effectively fulfill both aesthetic and practical needs. 

The profile illustrates a consistent desire for reliable, visually appealing beauty tools that cater to functionality, quality, and convenience.
